allow: Bash(PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 POSTGRES_USER=lifecalling POSTGRES_PASSWORD=lifecalling POSTGRES_HOST=localhost POSTGRES_PORT=5432 POSTGRES_DB=lifecalling python -c "from app.db import SessionLocal; from app.models import Case, Client; db = SessionLocal(); test_client = db.query(Client).first(); if test_client: cases = db.query(Case).filter(Case.client_id == test_client.id).all(); print(f''Client: {test_client.id} - {test_client.name}''); print(f''Cases: {len(cases)}''); [print(f''  Case {c.id}: {c.status}'') for c in cases]; else: print(''No clients found''); db.close()")
